about_us_welcome_to: Welcome to INTERNY, the world's first global remote online internship platform.
about_us_intern_text: INTERNY, which enables the internship process to be carried out from the beginning to the end, is a platform that aims to allow interns to get global work experience wherever and whenever they want.
about_us_company_text: INTERNY is a platform that enables companies to find interns with whom they perform the global internship process remotely and online from the beginning to the end.
about_us_university_text: INTERNY offers universities the opportunity to follow all their students' global remote online internship processes reliably and transparently from one place.
landing_search_keyword_definition: Enter position name, keyword or company name
landing_search_location_definition: Enter city name, country or state name
landing_prepare_cv_definition: Easily apply to thousands of jobs from anywhere
landing_internships_list_title: Find an Internship and Advance Your Career
landing_internships_list_definition: Each month, thousands of students get career opportunities via Interny
landing_outstanding_companies_text: Each year, more than 400 million interns turn to INTERNY as searching for internships.
landing_on_image_text: Apply here for any of the thousands of internships around the world.
landing_how_it_works_definition: Each year, more than 400 million interns turn to INTERNY as searching for internships, making over thousands applications every day.
landing_how_it_works_card1_text: Sign up and buy the requested package. Then apply for the internships for acceptance.
landing_how_it_works_card2_text: Use iCC™ to prove and improve the competency to be the primary candidate if necessary.
landing_how_it_works_card3_text: Use iMS™ to manage tasks assigned for the internship and to contact the company.
landing_how_it_works_card4_text: Take your WFA report. If you're over 60% successful, get your signed Reference Letter.
landing_what_interns_say_text: Thousands of university students and recent graduates easily found internships they deserve anywhere in the world
landing_see_intern_packages_text: Click to see detail of packages
footer_description: Provides a complete online service for anyone looking for a new internship worldwide. We are not a recruitment agency. We are an online internship platform that supports the intern and the company from the beginning to the end of the internship process.
reference_letter_text: Enter the details below. Then you can check the Reference Letter.
campaign_header_subtitle: What will happen during the campaign process?
campaign_summer_internship_part_descript: Are you ready to do your 2021 summer internship globally, online, and remotely? Firstly, you need to purchase the 60% discounted Summer Internship package below. You can then do your summer internship at any time, in any country and sector you wish, by working remotely. Sharing your internship expectations in detail will enable us to determine the most suitable company for you. You can guarantee that you will definitely start your summer internship.
campaign_find_jobs_part_description: We will find the most suitable company for you in the country and sector of your choice. First of all, companies will be enabled to choose you by sharing your CV. If any company does not accept you, we will determine the company for you where you will start the internship. This company information will be shared with you four weeks before the internship start date. If you want to change the company designated for you, you will able to apply for open internship applications.
campaign_remote_working_part_title: Do the Internship by Working Remotely
campaign_remote_working_part_description: You will start the 2021 summer internship on the date you set, globally, online, and remotely. Internship process is followed using Interny Management System (iMSTM). You will be able to access the company's task assignments and share its completed tasks via iMSTM. Besides, you will always contact the company using the messaging service throughout the internship process. Also, you will always evaluate each other with the company at the end of each task.
campaign_reference_letter_part_decriptio: Your performance in your internship is evaluated using Workforce Analytics (WFA). Moreover, you will have the opportunity to see your internship efficiency with the WFA report created using artificial intelligence. If you achieve a success rate of 60% or more, you will be eligible for the reference letter to be signed by the company. Therefore, you will have a verifiable reference letter from INTERNY that you can use when applying to companies for the rest of your business life.
campaign_faqs_question_between_date: Between what dates will summer internships be held?
campaign_faqs_answer_between_date: The 2021 Summer Internship Campaign covers your internship that you plan to start in June, July, or August. In this way, you are already guaranteed to start your 2021 summer internship.
campaign_faqs_answer_starting_guaranteed: Yes. You are guaranteed to start your 2021 summer internship with this campaign. The company determination process is carried out in two stages. Your CV will be shared with the suitable companies for you in the first stage, and the company will choose you. Suppose there is no acceptance from any company in the second stage. In that case, we will determine the company suitable for you as INTERNY. As a result, you will definitely start your 2021 summer internship in any country and sector you wish.
campaign_faqs_question_which_countries: In which countries can I do a remote internship?
campaign_faqs_answer_which_countries: Within the scope of this campaign, you can do your summer internship by working remotely in companies in the following countries: Austria, Azerbaijan, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Turkey, UK, and the USA.
campaign_faqs_question_which_sectors: In which sectors can I do a remote internship?
campaign_faqs_answer_which_sectors: Within the scope of this campaign, you can do your summer internship by working remotely in companies in the following sectors: Creative Arts and Design, Energy, Engineering and Manufacturing, Environment and Agriculture, Information Technology, Marketing and PR, Media and Internet, Recruitment and HR, Retail, Sales, and Education.
campaign_faqs_question_companies_remote: In which companies can I do a remote internship?
campaign_faqs_answer_companies_remote: More than 3000 actual companies in 18 countries and 11 sectors, especially leading corporate companies and startups, will perform their 2021 summer internships through INTERNY as part of this campaign.
campaign_faqs_question_internship_period: How long are the internship periods?
campaign_faqs_answer_internship_period: A Summer Internship Package is valid for 20 working days, i.e., four weeks of internship. If you need more internship days, you need to purchase two summer internship packages for 21-40 workdays and three summer internship packages for 41-60 workdays. During the summer internship, a maximum of 60 working days can be done.
campaign_faqs_question_change_internship: Can I change the internship start time or country afterward?
campaign_faqs_answer_change_internship: Yes. It will be sufficient to inform info@interny.net of your request until April 1, 2021.
campaign_faqs_question_what_languages: What languages can I use during my internship?
campaign_faqs_answer_what_languages: The common language in all internships is English. However, with the Language Support Service, internships in German, Spanish, French, Portuguese, or Turkish can be done. By purchasing the Language Support Service, the company's tasks will be delivered to you in the language you want. Likewise, the task reports you have prepared will be sent to the company on your behalf in English. In this way, you will be able to do your internship globally in the languages you want
campaign_faqs_question_end_internship: Can I have my internship documents signed by the company at the end of the internship?
campaign_faqs_answer_end_internship: Yes. The only difference between your remote internship with INTERNY and the normal internship process is that you are doing it online. Apart from that, you will do your internship in a real company only by working remotely. If you do your internship correctly, the company will sign your forms as usual.
howtouse_packages_intern_competency_paym: per Competency or $49.99 for All Competencies
howtouse_steps_join_and_apply_descriptio: You can log into your account by registering. You can attract the attention of companies looking for interns by editing your CV with your verified account. Now, you can start searching for the internship applications of companies. You have the opportunity to view company postings by filtering them as you wish. If you buy the INTERN package, you can apply to companies. You will start a new internship adventure at the company you have accepted.
howtouse_steps_icc_description: You will solve the core competency case studies with Interny Competency Center (iCC™), where the interns' competencies are analyzed. By purchasing the Competency package, you will have the opportunity to see your level of 15 different core competencies. These competencies are evaluated using artificial intelligence and delivered to you as entirely reliable results. In this way, you will prove your competence both to the companies you apply to and yourself.
howtouse_steps_ims_description: INTERNY internship process is followed using Interny Management System (iMS™). You will be able to access the company's task assignments and share its completed tasks via iMS™. Besides, you will always contact the company using the messaging service throughout the internship process. Also, at the end of your internship, you will evaluate each other with the company.
howtouse_steps_reference_letter_descript: Your performance in your internship is evaluated using Workforce Analytics (WFA). Moreover, you will have the opportunity to see your internship efficiency with the WFA report created using artificial intelligence. If you achieve a success rate of 60% or more, you will be eligible for the reference letter to be signed by the company. Therefore, you will have a verifiable reference letter from INTERNY that you can use when applying to companies for the rest of your business life.
howtouse_intern_welcome_to_interny: Welcome to INTERNY, the world's first remote online internship platform. You will find everything you need and more during the internship process on the platform. It allows you to do your internship at any company anywhere in the world, wherever and whenever you want. All you have to do is apply for internships, get acceptance, and complete the assigned tasks thoroughly
howtouse_intern_welcome_to_interny_parag: It is entirely FREE for university students and recent graduates to register, create a CV and search for internships anywhere in the world. You can use this unique platform more efficiently by purchasing the premium packages below that you think are suitable for you.
howtouse_header_title: How to Use the Platform as an Intern?
howtouse_click_see_detail_packages: Click to see detail of packages
howtouse_header_title_company_: How to Use the Platform as a Company?
howtouse_click_see_detail_packages_compa: Click to see detail of packages
howtouse_header_title_universty_: How to Use the Platform as a University?
howtouse_click_see_detail_packages_unive: Click to see detail of packages
howtouse_company_welcome_to_interny: Welcome to INTERNY, the world's first remote online internship platform. You will find everything you need and more during the internship process on the platform. It fulfills all your internship needs, and allows you to manage the internship process in detail. It allows you to do a job with any intern you want anywhere in the world with task assignments. All you have to do is to publish a detailed internship, choose any of the interns who apply to your company and follow up the assignments on time with their explanations
howtouse_company_welcome_to_interny_para: Welcome to INTERNY, the world's first remote online internship platform. You will find everything you need and more during the internship process on the platform. It fulfills all your internship needs, and allows you to manage the internship process in detail. It allows you to do a job with any intern you want anywhere in the world with task assignments. All you have to do is to publish a detailed internship, choose any of the interns who apply to your company and follow up the assignments on time with their explanations
howtouse_steps_company_join_and_publish_: You can create a company account to work with any interns anywhere in the world. After logging in with your verified account, you can post free advertisements for interns to apply to your company. You can start the internship process by determining the interns you want. You can also purchase one of the COMPANY or HIRING packages to see the Interny Internship Pool.
howtouse_steps_company_ims_description: You can follow your intern's internship process with whom you started to work on the Interny Management System (iMS™). Using iMS™, you can assign a task to your intern. When the assigned task for your intern is completed, it will be communicated to you via iMS™. Also, you will always be able to communicate with your intern using the messaging service. At the end of the internship period, you will evaluate each other mutually and complete the internship.
howtouse_steps_company_e_learning_descri: You can support the improvement of your interns with E-Learning, a unique service offered to companies. When you purchase the E-Learning package, you will have the opportunity to share your company content or Interny E-Learning contents with your interns. You will follow all your interns' developments in this process with E-Learning Analytics created using artificial intelligence.
howtouse_steps_company_reference_letter_: The internship performance of the intern is evaluated using Workforce Analytics (WFA). At the end of the internship, a WFA report is prepared using artificial intelligence. Interns who are determined to have 60% or more success in the WFA report will be entitled to get a reference letter. The reference letter signed by you will be presented to your intern, who is entitled to the reference letter at the end of the internship.
howtouse_steps_unviersty_join_and_follow: First of all, you need to create a user account for your university as interny@universitydomain. You can register on behalf of your university with the user account you have made. In this way, you can follow all your students' internship status and detail from the panel specially prepared for universities.
howtouse_steps_unviersty_e_learning_desc: By joining the Interny E-Learning system, you can enable your students to access your E-Learning contents. E-Learning is a system with contents created for interns' development, whose contents are presented to interns within the platform. In addition, you can see in detail your students' progress with their E-Learning content. You can follow the progress of your students with E-Learning Analytics created using artificial intelligence.
howtouse_steps_unviersty_manage_descript: You can buy any of the premium packages specially prepared for universities. In this way, you can enable your students to do internships. Besides, you can check the internship processes of your students in detail. You can view your students' current status in their internships in detail by using the panel that will open when you log in with your university user account.
howtouse_universty_welcome_to_interny: Welcome to INTERNY, the world's first remote online internship platform. You will find everything you need and more during the internship process on the platform. It enables the internship process to be managed from the beginning to the end of the internship. It enables the internship to be done in a company anywhere in the world, at any time and place. All that needs to apply to companies' applications as an intern. Get acceptance from the company, and complete the tasks assigned.
howtouse_universty_welcome_to_interny_pa: As a university, you can follow the entire internship process of your students completely FREE. You can manage your university's internship processes in the most detailed way by purchasing the premium packages. These packages are created for bulk sales for your students registered to your university and offer your students the unique features you want:
affiliate_join_intery: Join the INTERNY affiliate program at the world's first global remote online internship platform, and start taking advantage of opportunities.
affiliate_explore_desc: Explore the INTERNY platform and package details
affiliate_include_network_desc: Inform your network about the INTERNY platform.
affiliate_include_make_money_dec: Become a partner to the earnings from your reference.
affiliate_how_will_you_earn_path1: Get involved in the INTERNY affiliate program. Sign up for the world's first global remote online internship platform as a partner
affiliate_how_will_you_earn_path2: Access your referral code and start using your referral code
affiliate_how_will_you_earn_path3: Share your referral code. You can share your referral code with your network on your website, social media accounts, etc.
affiliate_how_will_you_earn_path4: Qualify for commission. Be a 10% share in the income of INTERNY packages purchased with the links you share.
affiliate_ask_question: You can contact us with any questions.
faqs_intern_answer_what_internship: Internship refers to the period that a person spends working in any organization to increase professional knowledge. The primary purpose of doing an internship is to get experience in the business.
faqs_intern_answer_what_interny: INTERNY is the world's first global remote online internship platform. It allows you to manage your internship process from beginning to end. INTERNY platform enables you to do an internship in the desired company, anywhere and anytime. All you have to do is apply for internships, get acceptance, and complete the assigned tasks thoroughly.
faqs_intern_answer_what_should: You can use this platform to get work experience, show yourself, and develop yourself with companies worldwide beyond your region's possibilities. Besides, you can easily choose the INTERNY platform to gain a global vision, remove borders, and create profound awareness in the recruitment process.
faqs_intern_answer_who_use: First of all, you must be a member of the INTERNY platform. After you become a member, you can create a CV and apply for internships worldwide with the CV you created. At this stage, you can visit the Interny Competency Center (iCCTM) to prove the core competencies that companies have determined as a priority. If you have to get acceptance from any company and have approved it, you can begin your internship remotely and online. During the internship, you will use the Interny Management System (iMSTM). You will carry out your task tracking via iMSTM. If necessary, you will be able to use the messaging service to reach the company. At the end of the internship, a workforce analytics (WFA) report will be produced according to company feedback and artificial intelligence analysis. As a result of this report, you will be entitled to get a signed reference letter from the company if you are deemed appropriate.
faqs_intern_answer_paid: It's completely free to sign up, create a CV, and search for internships. It is necessary to purchase the INTERN package to make internship applications, follow the internship process, and make reports. You will then be able to apply to as many companies as you want. Suppose you do not get internship acceptance within two months despite your internship applications. In that case, the amount you paid will be refunded. Some companies or universities cover this payment. If this payment has been met, the intern's fee will be refunded to the intern if the internship begins.
faqs_intern_question_faculty_restriction: Herhangi bir fakülte/bölüm kısıtlaması var Are there any faculty/department restrictions?
faqs_intern_answer_faculty_restrictions: All departments can easily use the INTERNY platform. There is no section restriction.
faqs_intern_answer_internship_approved: This issue is given great importance. The evaluation of the internship process is done in different ways and meticulously. Only if the internship is done and successful, the internship is approved. Any other internship is not approved.
faqs_intern_question_what_wfa: What is the Workforce Analytics (WFA) report?
faqs_intern_answer_what_wfa: A WFA report containing the intern's job performance status is created according to the company's feedback using artificial intelligence. This report allows you to evaluate the internship process in detail.
faqs_intern_question_reference_letter: How can I get a reference letter?
faqs_intern_answer_reference_letter: An average success rate is obtained according to the Workforce Analytics (WFA) report. If this success rate is over 60%, you will get a reference letter signed by the company's authorized person. According to the WFA report, the higher your success rate, the better your reference letter's content.
faqs_intern_question_need_passport: Will I need a passport or visa?
faqs_intern_answer_need_passport: Since you can work from anywhere you want, you do not need a passport or visa. Still, additional documents may be required by the company. For this reason, you should read the announcements in detail.
faqs_intern_answer_really_exist: The information of all companies is gotten and presented in detail. Therefore, all companies on the INTERNY platform are real. Each company registered on the platform is responsible for the accuracy of the information it shares. If there is an error or fraud in the information obtained about any company, please contact us.
faqs_intern_answer_evaluate_companies: During the internship, a short questionnaire is conducted to evaluate the company after each assignment and at the end of the internship. With this survey, the company is appropriately assessed and informed.
faqs_intern_question_what_ims: What is the Interny Management System (iMSTM)?
faqs_intern_answer_what_ims: iMSTM manages the internship tasks between the intern and the company. Everything the company asks the intern to do as a job is expressed as a task in Research, Examination, Evaluation, Design, Application, and Reporting. The company elaborates every task that needs to be done during the internship process and transmits it to the internship via iMSTM for the intern to complete within a specific time frame. Task follow-ups are carried out via iMSTM for both the company and the intern.
faqs_intern_answer_cant_what_time: For each internship, the time zone of the city where the internship company is located is used. Any assigned task is forwarded to the interns at 23.59 at the end of the day they are given.
faqs_intern_question_cant_complete_task: What if I can't complete the tasks on time?
faqs_intern_answer_cant_complete_task: If, for any reason, you cannot deliver your assignment on time, an extra day will be automatically added to your tenure for one time only. If the same problem continues, your internship will be canceled. For this reason, for whatever reason, it is recommended that you deliver your tasks on time.
faqs_intern_answer_competency_report: The report, in which 15 core competencies are measured in the Interny Competency Center (iCCTM), is called the competence report. In core competencies such as analytical thinking, your core competencies are determined according to the answers given in the simulation presented to the intern with case studies. Competency reports also include advice on how to improve yourself.
faqs_intern_question_competency_report_v: Does the competency report have validity?
faqs_intern_answer_competency_report_val: Each competency report is obtained by artificial intelligence, using case studies designed for you. Competency reports are created in different global standards for each competency. These standards ensure the validity and reliability of the reports obtained. The norms and validity/reliability studies in case studies in core competencies are determined under each country's internal dynamics.
faqs_intern_question_recreate_competency: Can I generate the competency report again?
faqs_intern_answer_recreate_competency_r: Yes, you can. If you think you have improved yourself in terms of competencies, you can re-create your competency report. The repetition time for each competency is different, and after 2-4 weeks, you can create a competency report again.
faqs_intern_question_internship_company: Can I do my internship at the company?
faqs_intern_answer_internship_company: INTERNY platform does not provide any service in this regard. If the company requests it, the intern will be informed on this matter
faqs_intern_question_approved_university: Will my university approve my internship?
faqs_intern_answer_approved_university: There is no difference between doing an internship with the INTERNY platform and doing an internship usually. With the university account, your internship process can be followed transparently by your university. However, each university's internship approval process is different. For this reason, we recommend that you choose an internship that will meet your university's expectations.
faqs_intern_question_language_problem: I am having a language problem. Can you help me?
faqs_intern_answer_language_problem: Language Support Service is offered in addition to the INTERN package for some languages to overcome your language problem. In this way, it is possible to get and deliver your tasks in your preferred language.
faqs_intern_question_help_me: I need to do my internship urgently. Can you help me?
faqs_intern_answer_help_me: Emergency Internship Service is offered in addition to the INTERN package to start your internship in the country and field you want within one month. However, internship processes usually continue. The fact that this service is purchased does not mean that your internship will be approved.
faqs_company_answer_what_interny: You can use the INTERNY platform to ease your workload, get rid of operational expenses, and expand your pool of interns globally. Besides, you can quickly increase business performance, bring a global vision, and choose the right candidate during the recruitment process by giving the same job to more than one intern.
faqs_company_answer_why_use: İş yükünüzü hafifletmek, operasyonel giderlerden kurtulmak ve stajyer havuzunuzu global çapta genişletmek için INTERNY platformunu kullanabilirsiniz. Ayrıca aynı işi birden fazla stajyere vererek iş başarımını arttırmak, global bir vizyon kazandırmak ve işe alım sürecinde daha doğru adayı seçmek için de kolaylıkla tercih edebilirsiniz.
faqs_company_answer_which_companies: It can be easily used by every company, such as startups, SMEs, and corporate companies. It is possible to have internships in many departments of factories using the INTERNY platform.
faqs_company_answer_how_use: First of all, you must be a member. After you become a member, you can create your company profile and reach interns worldwide with detailed internship postings. At this stage, you can determine a core competency suitable for you and choose the right candidate. If you have accepted an internship application, you can start the internship remotely and online. During the internship, you will use the Interny Management System (iMSTM). You will carry out your task assignments and internship management via iMSTM. If necessary, you will be able to use the messaging service to reach the intern. According to your feedback and artificial intelligence analysis, a workforce analytics (WFA) report will be produced for the intern at the end of the internship. As a result of this report, you undertake to provide your intern with a reference letter signed by your company official, if you see fit.
faqs_company_question_how_many_interns: How many interns can I employ?
faqs_company_answer_how_many_interns: You can post as many internship postings as you want. However, you can employ a maximum of 10 interns at the same time for any internship posting.
faqs_company_answer_what_time: Internship follow-ups are made according to the time used by your company. Any assigned task is forwarded to the intern at 23.59 at the end of the day he is appointed.
faqs_company_answer_paid: Being a member, creating a company profile, posting internships, and managing your interns are entirely free. The intern pays a certain fee to make internship applications, follow the internship process, and create reports. If you want, you can afford this fee as a company. You can also check out the premium packages to use the other unique features of the INTERNY platform.
faqs_company_question_approve_every: Do we need to approve every internship?
faqs_company_answer_approve_every: This issue is given great importance. The evaluation of the internship process is done in different ways and meticulously. If the internship process is done and successful, the internship is approved. Any internships other than this are not approved. We even recommend that you be selective during your internship.
faqs_company_questions_what_wfa: What is the Workforce Analytics (WFA) report?
faqs_company_answer_what_wfa: A WFA report showing the intern's business status is created according to the feedbacks using artificial intelligence. This report allows the internship process to be analyzed in detail.
faqs_company_question_when_sign_referenc: When do I have to sign the reference letter?
faqs_company_answer_when_sign_reference: A success rate is achieved according to the Workforce Analytics (WFA) report. If this success rate is over 60%, a signed reference letter must be approved by the company's authorized person. According to the WFA report, the higher the success rate achieved, the better its reference letter. The reference letter is created automatically according to the WFA report. You can make changes to this report if you wish or choose to sign just this letter.
faqs_company_answer_only_online: INTERNY platform provides services only online. If the company requests a different working style, the intern will be informed separately about this.
faqs_company_question_need_passport: Do you need a passport or visa?
faqs_company_answer_need_passport: There is no need for a passport or visa, as it is possible to work from anywhere. If you want, you can request more documents while posting the advertisement.
faqs_company_question_language_problem: Do you have a solution to the language problem?
faqs_company_answer_language_problem: Language Support Service is provided for some languages ​​to overcome the language problem. In this way, it is ensured that the tasks are assigned to the internship, translated on your behalf, and delivered to you.
faqs_company_question_local_internship: Can it be used in local internships?
faqs_company_answer_local_internship: There is no distinction between local or global internships. If you want, you can publish your advertisements only for local admissions. You can also filter the interns who will choose you according to the countries you wish to.
faqs_company_question_what_ims: What is the Interny Management System (iMSTM)?
faqs_company_answer_what_ims: iMSTM manages internship tasks between the intern and the company. In the fields of Research, Examination, Evaluation, Design, Application, and Reporting, everything you want from the intern as a job can be called a task. As a company, you formulate every task that needs to be done in the internship process in detail and forward it to the internship via iMSTM for the intern to complete within a specific time frame. Task follow-ups are carried out on iMS™ for both the company and the intern.
faqs_company_question_evaluate_intern: How can I evaluate the intern?
faqs_company_answer_evaluate_intern: During the internship, a survey is conducted to evaluate the intern after each task and at the end of the internship. With this survey, the intern is appropriately assessed and informed.
faqs_company_answer_is_safe: INTERNY platform is protected by 256-bit encryption and is secure at international standards. Besides, before the internship starts, the job contents can be protected with a confidentiality agreement.
faqs_company_question_fullfilling_duties: What should I do if the intern is not fulfilling the duties?
faqs_company_answer_fullfilling_duties: If you think that the duties are not done the way you want, you must first warn the intern. If the tasks are still not fulfilled as you wish after your warning, you can end the internship by sharing the problem.
faqs_company_answer_what_premium: Companies have been offered three different premium packages: E-LEARNING, BUSINESS, and HIRING. You can visit here for details.
faqs_universty_answer_what_interny: INTERNY is the world's first global remote online internship platform. It allows the internship process to be managed from the beginning to the end. It enables internships to be done in a company anywhere in the world, at any time and place. What needs to be done is to apply to the companies' advertisements, get acceptance from the company, and complete the intern's duties assigned by the company.
faqs_universty_answer_which_universities: It can be used easily in faculties and departments deemed appropriate by universities in every field. There is no section restriction.
faqs_universty_answer_should_use: You can use the INTERNY platform to give your students business experience and global vision. In this way, you can enable your students to work with companies worldwide and make it easier for them to create profound awareness in the recruitment process. Besides, you can easily choose the INTERNY platform to follow the internship processes from a single point in a reliable way.
faqs_universty_answer_how_use: First of all, you must create an e-mail account with the interny username (such as interny@itu.edu) in the domain of your university website. You can then register using this e-mail address and log into your university tracking system. You can now follow all your students' internship status in your university on the INTERNY platform in detail.
faqs_universty_answer_paid: Using the INTERNY platform for university is entirely free.
faqs_universty_answer_online_only: INTERNY platform provides services only online. If the company requests, the intern is also informed about this issue.
faqs_universty_answer_companies_exist: The information of all companies is gotten and presented in detail. Therefore, all companies on the INTERNY platform are real. Each company registered on the platform is responsible for the accuracy of the information it shares. If there is an error or fraud in the information obtained about any company, please contact us.
faqs_universty_question_follow_students: Can we follow our students enrolled in our university?
faqs_universty_answer_follow_students: You can log into your university tracking system from the university login screen. After entering, you can follow all your students' internship status and achievements enrolled in your university through the INTERNY platform in detail.
faqs_universty_answer_every_internship_a: This issue is critical. The evaluation of the internship process is done in different ways and meticulously. Only if the internship is done and successful, the internship is approved. Any internships other than this are not approved.
faqs_universty_answer_need_passport: There is no need for a passport or visa, as it is possible to work from anywhere. Companies may sometimes request additional documents.
faqs_universty_question_what_ims: What is the Interny Management System (iMSTM)?
faqs_universty_answer_what_ims: iMSTM manages internship tasks between the intern and the company. In the fields of Research, Examination, Evaluation, Design, Application, and Reporting, everything the company asks the intern to do as a job is expressed as a duty. The company elaborates every task that needs to be done during the internship process and transmits it to the intern via iMSTM to complete within a specific time. Task follow-ups are carried out on iMSTM for both the company and the intern.
faqs_universty_question_what_wfa: What is the Workforce Analytics (WFA) report?
faqs_universty_answer_what_wfa: A WFA report containing the intern's job performance status is created according to the company's feedback using artificial intelligence. This report allows you to evaluate the internship process in detail.
faqs_universty_question_number_increased: Can the number of university accounts be increased?
faqs_universty_answer_number_increased: One free account is given to each university. You can contact us for more account needs.
faqs_universty_question_upper_limit: Is there an upper limit for the number of students?
faqs_universty_answer_upper_limit: There is no student number restriction.
faqs_universty_answer_what_premium: Universities 3 different premium packages have been offered: UNIVERSITY Essential, UNIVERSITY Standard, and UNIVERSITY Plus. You can visit here for details.
gift_description: You can fill in the fields below to send an internship gift to anyone you wish.
investor_description_company_profile: INTERNY Inc. is the world's first remote online internship platform company, headquartered in Silicon Valley, California. It also has offices in Rotterdam, Istanbul, London, and Dubai. INTERNY Inc., which provides a global remote online internship opportunity in the globalized world, offers its investors the chance to high profit
investor_description_mission_statement: INTERNY aims to bring together interns and companies around the world and offers a remote online internship adventure. In this way, it brings together companies in developed countries and interns in developing countries, eliminates the borders between countries, and creates equal opportunities. Also, it offers a brand new internship experience for both companies, interns, and universities with its platforms that appeal to the more digitized Z generation.
investor_description_why_invest: INTERNY Inc. offers the opportunity to find each other for all interns and companies and allows internships to be managed through the platform from beginning to the end of the internship. It is the first company in the world to have a remote online internship platform. INTERNY Inc. carries out its operations alone in a vast market. Moreover, it is a company that is open to growth and offers its investors the opportunity to profit with its team of expert and fully open mind people.
investor_contact: You can contact us with any questions.

help_center_which_area: In which area are you having problems?
help_center_share_us: Can you share your problem with us?
